Tunisian President on Friendly Relations with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Tunisian President Zine El Abidine Ben Ali laid stress on further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the governments and peoples of the DPRK and Tunisia when he received credentials from new DPRK Ambassador Ri Pyong Ho on December 18.
 The president wished the Korean people greater progress and prosperity.

Greetings to Swiss President
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Joseph Deiss on Dec. 24 on his election as president of Switzerland.
 Expressing rejoice over the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Switzerland which are how expanding and developing in different fields, the message wished him great success in his responsible work for development of the country and happiness of the people.
